attributes.action: The EDEXCEL GCSE Maths exam was by far challenging, difficult and impotent.
attributes.background: This was regarding 26/05/2016's maths exam, 2016, for the EDEXCEL GCSE students regarding its difficulty.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition because it does not call for clear, specific action from either the UK Government or Parliament. 

In any case, the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the difficulty of exam papers. Exam boards are responsible for the questions they set. Exam boards are regulated by the Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulation (Ofqual), which regulates qualifications, examinations and assessments in England.

You can make a complaint to Ofqual about the organisations it regulates. Further information about how to complain is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofqual/about/complaints-procedure.
